mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_alipay ( account_id, user_id, avatar, nick_name, province, city, gender, user_type, user_status, is_certified, is_student_certified ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{userId}, #{avatar}, #{nickName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{gender}, #{userType}, #{userStatus}, #{isCertified}, #{isStudentCertified} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE avatar = #{avatar}, nick_name = #{nickName}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, gender = #{gender}, user_type = #{userType}, user_status = #{userStatus}, is_certified = #{isCertified}, is_student_certified = #{isStudentCertified}
